dialogueLines.line: Hey, what are you doing on my car?!
dialogueLines.speaker: mom

dialogueLines.line: I was kinda hoping you wouldn't notice.
dialogueLines.speaker: pico

dialogueLines.line: Get off! You're muddying up my limo with your filthy shoes.
dialogueLines.speaker: mom

dialogueLines.line: We're in the middle of traffic and your driver is speeding on the highway.
dialogueLines.speaker: pico

dialogueLines.line: I can't just hop off here. Are you trying to get me killed?
dialogueLines.speaker: pico

dialogueLines.line: In that case, let's see if you can still say that after I fill you with lead.
dialogueLines.speaker: pico

dialogueLines.line: I can't tell whether you're brave or just stupid, but I'm taking a liking to your attitude.
dialogueLines.speaker: mom

dialogueLines.line: How about we make a deal?
dialogueLines.speaker: mom

dialogueLines.line: If you win, I'll let you stay on my limo.
dialogueLines.speaker: mom
